downloadTitle: Script to identify SharePoint web parts to be migrated
downloadDescription: Identify the SharePoint pages in your organization to be changed to use the newer Conversations web part instead of the deprecated Highlights web part
detailsSection: PowerShell script to identify SharePoint page with legacy Viva Engage Web Parts and sample configuration files in JSON format.
systemRequirementsSection:
Operating Systems: all official PowerShell-supported operating systems
PowerShell 5.1 or higher
PnP PowerShell module
An Azure AD application registration with appropriate permissions. Follow PnP PowerShell app registration instructions
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
